title: Mugthakk/settings (#49)
message:
Mugthakk/settings (#49)

* Adds working Settings, allowing to change the new playerAppearance-field in GameSettings

* Updates GameSettings and Assets to control which Texture should currently be used for the player.

* Updates the DrawableComponent of the player-entity on every resume from pause, making the changes to appearance be applied. Probably a better way to do this, but it works.
